titleStmt.title: A perfect narrative of the proceedings of the army under the command of Col. Michael Iones commander in chiefe of the forces in the province of Leymster in their last advance from Dublin; with the taking of the strong castles and forts of Ballysonan, Allan, Black-hall, Raville, and Granye, in the said province. / Sent in a letter to some persons of quality at Westminster. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: T. I.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed on p.1: Dublin, 2 Octob. 1648. T.I.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings head in the old Bayley
